def_cn: （竞争团体或国家间的）均势
def_en: The balance of power is the way in which power is distributed between rival groups or countries.

def_cn: （小政党能够使某一较大政党成为政府中多数派的）举足轻重的地位
def_en: If a small political party holds the balance of power in a government, it is able to give a larger party a majority by supporting this larger party.
